doc.name: CartesianToComplex
doc.description: Convert a Cartesian pair (represented as two double tokens) to a single complex token. At each firing of the actor, it will consume exactly one token from each of the two input ports and produce a complex token on the output port. The x input becomes the real output and the y input becomes the imaginary output. If either input port is empty, nothing is produced.
doc.author: Michael Leung, Jie Liu, Edward A. Lee, Paul Whitaker
doc.port: The input port for the x coordinate of the Cartesian pair, which has type DoubleToken.
The input port for the y coordinate of the Cartesian pair, which has type DoubleToken.
The port for the output, which has type ComplexToken.
